title: The $1000 AMD B450 Gaming PC!
description: Let's build a powerful Gaming PC with core components that cost ~$1,000! This is an all-AMD system with a B450 motherboard, Ryzen 5 2600X & RX 580 8GB graphics card. Let's see how this collection of parts perform in late 2018.  Note:  After OS, peripherals and the optional AIO the cost of this build is ~$1300.  :)  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below: ---------------------------------------- Cooler Master ML360R RGB:   Memory Express (For Canadians):   ---------------------------------------- *** FULL PARTS LIST *** MSI B450 Tomahawk:  MSI RX 580 8GB OC:  Ryzen 5 2600X:  Ryzen 5 2600:  OCZ Toshiba RC100 NVMe SSD:  Phanteks P300 Case:  Corsair CX550 Power Supply:  CableMod Basic Cable Extensions:  Corsair Vengeance LPX DDR4 RAM:  Thermaltake Floe 240 AIO:  Enermax T.B. RGB 120mm fans:  WD BLUE HDD:  Keyboard + Mouse Set ($65):    Subscribe    Review units provided free of charge by MSI. This video is sponsored by Cooler Master & MemoryExpress. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates!
